scenario.name: UAC stream with 1 packet wrong SSRC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:conf-[pid]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=udp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 101 INVITE To: <sip:conf-[pid]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, OPTIONS, INFO, BYE, CANCEL, ACK, UPDATE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY User-Agent: Mitel NeTS 5.11.1022.0/5.11.1022.0 X-NeTS-actorid: {839BB046-E2A1-4C94-92F6-4D372C63E9A5} X-NeTS-callcontext: mctx1_839BB046 Expires: 1 Contact: "NeTS mctx1_839BB046" <sip:conf-[pid]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag-[pid]-[call_number]
v=0 o=CiscoSystemsCCM-SIP 56608499 1 IN IP4 10.50.153.202 s=SIP Call c=IN IP4 10.50.153.209 b=TIAS:64000 b=AS:64 t=0 0 m=audio 17548 RTP/AVP 8 101 a=ptime:20 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15

ACK sip:conf-[pid]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=udp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag-[pid]-[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag-[pid]-[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
